title: Rental in Las Vegas with right to purchase. Open house this Sat 8/6
posting_body: ['Great home located in Las Vegas with 3 bedrooms and 2 baths', 'Open House Sat 8/6 from 10-1', 'Contact me to learn more about this innovative Lease with a Right to purchase program.', 'Unlike many lease to own programs, there is no obligation to buy and no non-refundable option fees.', 'There will be a live seminar on site a this property this weekend along with food, drinks, prizes and Q and A session!', '45 Days from applying to move in day', 'Basic requirements to Qualify**', '*Annual household income of $40,000+', '*Stable employment', '*No history of eviction or other landlord issues', '*No pending bankruptcy', '*No disqualifying criminal history', 'Listing and photos provided by BHHS Properties', 'Contact me today with more information!']
